project.name: Atlas Mobile
project.scope: Cross-platform app, feature flags, offline sync

sections.title: Vision & Strategic Fit
sections.goal: Understand how Atlas Mobile aligns with company mission and values, and the CTO's vision for it.
sample_questions: How does Atlas Mobile fit into Novereon's broader cloud-native platform strategy?
What specific regulatory or safety-first considerations influenced the pilot phase design?
In what ways do you see Atlas Mobile supporting sustainable velocity?

sections.title: User Experience Goals
sections.goal: Explore the intended UX outcomes, target personas, and how offline sync and feature flags support them.
sample_questions: What core user problems is Atlas Mobile aiming to solve?
How did the team prioritize which features to include in the pilot?
Can you describe how offline sync was designed to handle intermittent connectivity?

sections.title: Technical Architecture & Dependencies
sections.goal: Map the technical architecture, key dependencies, and integration points with other Novereon projects.
sample_questions: Which backend services or APIs are most critical to Atlas Mobile's success?
How does feature flagging integrate with existing CI/CD and QA processes?
Were there any multi-project dependencies, for example with Poseidon Networking or Aegis IAM?

sections.title: Risk Management & Evidence Gathering
sections.goal: Understand how risks are identified, mitigated, and validated with evidence.
sample_questions: What are the top risks you identified for the pilot, and how are they tracked?
Can you share an example of a runbook or RFC that directly influenced a design decision?
How do you measure success or failure during the pilot phase?

sections.title: Trade-offs & Future Roadmap
sections.goal: Discuss trade-offs made during pilot and potential directions for scale.
sample_questions: Were there any deliberate compromises in UX or performance to meet regulatory or security constraints?
How will learnings from the pilot feed into the scale phase?
What is your decision-making process for prioritizing roadmap items post-pilot?
